Category: Personal

"Personal" posts on kaidez.com include work that I've done rants, conference experiences and a few random posts that are uncategorized and don't fit anywhere else.

ABOUT ME

I'm a web developer for Revlon. I like to "over-communicate" in my tutorials so beginners can better understand the topics being discussed.
